Workflow.Name: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Frequency
Workflow.Description:
For AvSec Risks - This flow runs when the Risk Rating on an Operational Activity Risk Score record is modified.
It checks for a related Entity Risk Frequency based on the record's Fiscal Year and any matching fields in the associated Operation Activity, including Activity Type, Operation, Operation Type, Program Area, Site, or Stakeholder.
If a matching Entity Risk Frequency is found, the flow updates the lookup on the Operational Activity Risk Score and sets its Risk Frequency to the value from the Entity Risk Frequency.
If no match is found, the flow retrieves the Risk Frequency from the Risk Rating associated with the Operational Activity Risk Score and updates the record accordingly.
